data.text:
https://www.instagram.com/p/B87czIyl-NG

She had gained wide exposure when she starred in a supporting role as ‘Rhiannon Abernathy’ in ‘Easy A’ alongside Emma Stone and Amanda Bynes. Her other film credits include ‘The Roommate,’ ‘Grown Ups 2,’ and ‘Weepah Way,’ among others.

Aly Michalka: personal life and husband

Returning to her personal life, she is married to independent film producer Stephen Ringer. The couple started dating in 2012 when they met on the set of their movie ‘Sequoia’. In 2014, she announced her engagement through her Instagram post and also flaunted her engagement ring. They got engaged in Big Sur, California in July 2014 and married in a small ceremony in Portofino, Italy on June 6, 2015.

Previously, before she hooked up with her husband, she had been linked with some handsome guys. She dated Raviv Ullman after meeting him in 2005 and broke up with her in 2011. From 2011 to 2013, she has been dating Michalka and has been in Joel David Moore. Following Joel’s split, she had an affair with Matt Barr and Robbie Jones. Also, it is reported that she had an encounter with Matt Leinart (2008 – 2011).

Subtitle : Aly Michalka and her husband Stephen Ringer.

Source : Daily Mail

Aly Michalka: Net Worth and Social Media Profiles

The American actress has accumulated a lot from her acting career. Furthermore, she has also maintained a profitable amount of her singing career. However, there is no information about her salary or her annual income. However, she reported her to have a net worth estimated at around $4 million.

She is very active on different social media platforms with personal and verified accounts. But on Facebook, she has a joint account @AlyandAJ along with sister AJ which has more than 250k followers. She has an Instagram account @iamaly with 596k followers. On Twitter, she goes for the handle @Aly and AJ with 601.4k followers.

Aly Michalka: Net Worth

The gorgeous lady has a slim and well-groomed body that stands at a height of 5 feet 8 inches or 1.73 meters. Her perfect body weighs 55kg and is 36-24-36 inches in bra size 34C. Also, she has a green eye color with blonde dyed hair.
